data.content: Confirmed Accumulative Attack with PGD Linf adversarial trigger during the online training phase. The model experienced substantial accumulative degradation prior to trigger (76.9%→37.2%, −39.7 pts) and a further post-trigger collapse (37.24%→22.64%, −14.60 pts) accompanied by a loss explosion (4.386→11.462, ×2.62). The total accuracy drop is −54.3 pts. The magnitude of the trigger-induced degradation exceeds known benchmarks at lower epsilon and is consistent with the stronger ε=0.2 configuration. No indicators of Label Flipping or Brainwash are present. Verdict: Accumulative Attack; poisoning success confirmed.

Accumulative Attack. Online training accumulative poisoning with PGD L∞ trigger (ε=0.2). Severe pre-trigger degradation (76.9%→37.2%) and additional post-trigger collapse (37.24%→22.64%) with loss surge (4.386→11.462). No evidence of Label Flipping or Brainwash. Verdict: Accumulative Attack; poisoning success confirmed.
